review: For such a bargain-priced streamer, I expected the Fire Stick to be slow and limited, but that couldn't be further from the truth! It feels as responsive as, say, my Apple TV or Roku, and the menu system and app are great! Voice search through the app is especially useful, and it's awesome that the remote uses Bluetooth because it can go through walls and A/V cabinets if you keep your equipment out-of-sight (like I do).The main draw for us, however, is that it seems to be the least expensive, most user-friendly way to stream Amazon Prime content, and since Amazon currently has an exclusive on Nickelodeon shows like Dora, Diego and Julius Jr., it's a favorite of our littlest daughter!Well worth the price. Awesome product!
